EventComponent.Name: Sports Events - 3x3 Basketball Tournament
EventComponent.Title: 3x3 Basketball Tournament
EventComponent.Abstract:
-Cost will be $2 per participant.
-Saturday, March 9th will be a round robin tournament beginning at 6:00 pm with registration at 5:30 pm.
-The roster cap will be 4 participants.
-Winners will receive a College T-Shirt and a RecSports Championship t-shirt!
